author: Gabby Orr and Melanie Zanona
title: Trump may offer help to Katie Britt in Alabama Senate primary -- even though he's already endorsed Mo Brooks

sentence: Recently, Biden asked Republican Senate candidates, former NFL running back Herschel Walker and Dr. Mehmet Oz, to step down from the President’s Council on Sports, Fitness & Nutrition or be taken off the Council or be fired.
author: Becky Noble
title: Republican Senate Candidate Herschel Walker Ousted From President’s Council On Sports, Fitness & Nutrition

sentence: The White House sent letters to Dr. Mehmet Oz and Herschel Walker, telling them they would be fired if they did not resign from the President's Council on Sports, Fitness and Nutrition, a White House official said.
author: Rick Rouan
title: Biden asks GOP Senate candidates Mehmet Oz, Herschel Walker to resign from presidential board
